description:
Trail running agility with the support and stability of a hiking boot, the Rush 2 GTX is ready for anything from high-mileage hikes to fast-packing missions. The lightweight construction won't weigh you down and the adaptive outsole cushions rough trails and provides grip wherever your adventure takes you.

  • Breathable fabric upper with welded PU overlays for durability
  • Gore-Tex® Invisible Fit Bluesign lining keeps water out
  • DST frame stabilizes feet and provides torsional rigidity
  • Active Fit System for a locked-in fit
  • Dual-density EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Presa® outsole with SuperGum rubber and IKS technology absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
name: Scarpa Rush 2 Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
